about_the_game:
About the Trial Version

In the demo version, you can experience a total of 7 endings and enjoy the story up to Chapter 2.

You can also experience scenarios for two characters, depending on your choices, but there are some parts that are slightly different from the full version, so please enjoy the various choices and their endings to your heart's content!

Your choices will determine whether the characters live or die!

In this game, you will be asked to make choices at every turn. It could be at the door to leave your house, or to accept a gift from your family. Some of these answers will determine your fate. Try to answer the questions as if you were a young man named Kohito. If you answer with an easy feeling, it may be irreversible. ......

The Village of the Vindictive” is a 2D horror adventure game that emphasizes [choice]. In this game, the player controls a character and tries to escape from an unknown monster while solving various riddles in the village.

The player must search for items and combine them if they are missing, or sometimes choose to rob other characters.

Can you escape from the monsters and return to your own world?

Synopsis

You control a young man named “Yukito” who is a typical high school student. He likes to go out with his friends to test his courage and confirm urban legends.

One day, he heard a rumor about an urban legend at school and performed a ritual, and as a result, he and his friends were taken to a strange world!

100 different endings

There are a total of 100 different endings in the game, including the ending that appears when the game is completed and the ending that has a disastrous ending depending on the choices made in the game. The collected endings can be viewed in the game.

Distribution Guidelines

We have no problem monetizing videos or streaming of our games.

Therefore, there is no need to contact us in advance.

However, we ask that you include a link to the “Village of Grudges” Steam page in the summary section of your video.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing in the workplace, including, but not limited to, blood, intense violence, and depictions of cruelty.

name: 怨嗟の村～Village of Grudges～ Demo
short_description: Village of Grudges is a 2D horror adventure game about choices. A series of cruel choices await the young men who have wandered into another world, and you must control them so that they can return to their original world in a world that changes depending on the choices you make.
